text: Night of the Creeps is a 1986 American science fiction horror comedy movie. It was the first movie Fred Dekker directed. It stars Jason Lively, Shane Black, Jill Whitlow, and Tom Atkins. It was distributed by TriStar Pictures. The movie did not make very much money in theaters. Since then, it has become a cult favorite. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 horror movies Category:1986 science fiction movies Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1980s science fiction horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Movies set in universities and colleges
title: Night of the Creeps
